body: As long as the v1 API contract is held, I feel like it doesn't matter how the OpKernel is written, and less code is better.  But my risk tolerance might be higher than everyone's :)
body_html: As long as the v1 API contract is held, I feel like it doesn't matter how the OpKernel is written, and less code is better. But my risk tolerance might be higher than everyone's :)
